name: overcooking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
overcook
to cook food for longer than necessary, reducing its quality as a result: Be careful not to overcook the pasta. The chicken was overcooked and dry.

to do or use something too much: Occasionally he overcooks the metaphors ("the wind howled like a gut-shot wolf"). People are fed up with overcooked TV tropes.
